404: The page you attempted to load was not found.

ErrorOccurred.errorInfo: We're not sure what happened there; how embarrassing! Please try again later, or if this keeps happening then let us know.

csrfError: Our security protections have failed to authenticate your request; to solve this you need to refresh the page:
incorrectToken: Incorrect token, please check and try again
unknownError: We're really sorry, but an unexpected error occurred. Please return to the homepage and try again.
weakp: The server believes this passphrase is too weak, please make it stronger
